entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
